mapper.select: select tb1.date date, tb1.dcount dcount, tb1.ducount ducount, dcount/ducount davg, tb2.lsducount lsducount from( select DATE_FORMAT(log_time,'%Y-%m-%d')date, count(DISTINCT user_role_id) ducount, count(1) dcount from role_login where 1=1 and log_time >= #{startTime} and log_time <= #{endTime} GROUP BY date ORDER BY date desc) tb1 left join (select DATE_FORMAT(log_time,'%Y-%m-%d')date, count(DISTINCT user_role_id) lsducount from role_login where 1=1 and log_time >= date_sub(#{startTime},INTERVAL 1 day) and log_time <= #{endTime} GROUP BY date ORDER BY date desc) tb2 on date_sub(tb1.date,INTERVAL 1 day)=tb2.date

select DATE_FORMAT(log_day,'%Y-%m-%d')date, avg(count)accu, max(count) puuc, count(DISTINCT log_time)timecount from role_online where 1=1 and log_time >= #{startTime} and log_time <= #{endTime} GROUP BY log_day order by log_day desc
select DATE_FORMAT(log_day,'%Y-%m-%d') date, sum(yb)ybincr from yb_incr where 1=1 and log_time >= #{startTime} and log_time <= #{endTime} GROUP BY log_day ORDER BY date desc
select DATE_FORMAT(log_day,'%Y-%m-%d') date, sum(yb)ybconsume from yb_consume where 1=1 and log_time >= #{startTime} and log_time <= #{endTime} GROUP BY log_day ORDER BY date desc
